item.title: My Goals for 2020 as a Software Developer
item.description: ðŸŽ‰ ðŸŽŠ ðŸŽ‰ ðŸŽŠ Happy New Year 2020 ðŸŽ‰ ðŸŽŠ ðŸŽ‰ ðŸŽŠ Preface It has been more than a decade since I started programming in college, back in 2009. 4 years later, I chose Software Developer as my career path. In the past 7 years of my software development career, I have learnt a lot and worked on multiple technologies and projects. But, there were a few things in my to-do list, which I could never get to, due to the usual excuses everyone makes such as being too busy or having no time.
